answers.answer: You did pregnancy test so early wait for few more days and repeat it. Good luck n lots of baby dust!!

thanks wishes3:):)   i too a HPT 15dpo and i got a faint positive and i called my doctor and the nurse told me to wait for a week if AFdont show up come to the hospital...this made me sad so i stopped taking hpt...but what i am really concerned about is that i was prescribed progestone supplements 200 for 2 times a day for just ten days from three days after ovulation so the tablet got over now...its been three days without tablets....i am afraid if the sudden drop in the progestone level could affect the baby...:(

question: i have PCOS but i am thin and no diabetes, ttc for nearly two years now...i was told by my doctor i am anovulatory which made me depressed and i was on letrozole for 6 months but dint work..this is the first month i am given letrozole plus FSH injections and this made me produce one dear follicle which was 19mm and was given trigger shot 12 days ago.I took a pregnancy test 9 days after trigger shot which came out negative which confirmed trigger shot was out of my system...but still sore nipples...when should i take the next pregnancy test to see the confirmed result...for all out there who are trying to concieve good luck and sticky baby dust
title: TTC for 2yrs with PCOS
